articles.title: NTHU Shuttle Bus Timetable of the Master’s Program Exam for the 2026 Academic Year (2/2, 2/4, 2/5)
Both NTHU Shuttle Bus and Nanda <-> Main Campus Shuttle Bus will be out of service on 2026/01/01(New Year's Day).
Both NTHU Shuttle Bus and Nanda <-> Main Campus Shuttle Bus will be out of service on 2026/2/14-2026/2/22(The Chinese New Year).
Both NTHU Shuttle Bus and Nanda <-> Main Campus Shuttle Bus will be out of service on 2025/12/25(Constitution Day).
NTHU Shuttle Bus Timetable During Winter Break 2025.12.22.~2026.02.22.
Nanda <->Main Campus Shuttle Bus Timetable During Winter Break 2025.12.22.~2026.02.22.
The Campus Shuttle Bus will be changed on 11/12(Sports Day).
Nanda <-> Main Campus Shuttle Bus Timetable 2025/11/3~2025/12/21.
Both NTHU Shuttle Bus and Nanda <-> Main Campus Shuttle Bus will be out of service during 2025/10/24-2025/10/26(Taiwan Restoration Day).
​​​​​​​Both NTHU Shuttle Bus and Nanda <-> Main Campus Shuttle Bus will be out of service during 2025/10/10-2025/10/12 (Double Tenth Day).
Both NTHU Shuttle Bus and Nanda <-> Main Campus Shuttle Bus will be out of service during 2025/10/4-2025/10/6 (Moon Festival).
